39375918.review:
Une trés bonne surprise !!!.
Etant fan du genre Shoot em Up, il est difficile de trouver un jeu du genre bien équilibré qui ne date pas d'une 15 d'année.
Ce jeu est agréable à la rétine et aux oreilles, à la manette aucun souci de contrôle, les stages qui peuvent paraitre petit au départ sont de la bonne longueur aprés plusieurs heures de jeu vue que le but est de recup toutes les étoiles distribué en fin de stage qui valide ou non les différents critère du stage.
Dans tous les cas ce jeu et un de mes meilleurs shoot em up acquis jusque là.

39159683.review:
Simplesmente um dos melhores jogos de navinha aka shoot 'em ups disponíveis nesta selva digital que é a Steam.

Não permita que o sistema de grind o desanime pois é exatamente neste formato de progressão utilizado pelo game que se esconde a diversão. Sky Force pode ser jogado desde leves sessões ocasionais até ousadas incursões de ponta-a-ponta no modo mais difícil, ou seja, um jogo fácil de agradar tanto os casuais quanto os jogadores mais hardcore. Sobre as conquistas e requerimentos de cada fase, são instigantes e você não vai querer parar até ter atingido todos os objetivos.

Ótimos gráficos, jogabilidade e trilha sonora. 

10/10 must have.

- Card ตกยาก แม้ว่าจะเล่นระดับยากสุด และมี Passive card ที่เพิ่มโอกาสเจอ Card ก็ตาม

39006234.review:
The game is good, even if most of its content is just an endless gringing for the few levels it has.

Pro:
 + Shooting feels goooood (what more do you need)
 + Graphics is very nice for a top-down shooter
 + Level design
 + Sound
 + Upgrade system.

Con:
 - prepare to repeat the previous levels for badges and stars over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over....... again.
 - (SUBJECTIVE) Level 5 - sorry, but seriously fuck that level. Either get hit by an EMP blast at the start, thereby disabling your weapons and dodging the bullets for the rest of the map (this is a TOP-DOWN SHOOTER game, not a TOP-DOWN DODGE game), OR avoid the EMP homming blast for the entire map forcing you to manover non-stop and shooting at the same time. For me this is not fun.
 - The game has only a few levels, but to complete those, you will have to earn badges which you can get by completeing the same levels on different difficulties, which you can only unlock if you got all the badges from the previous difficulty. so basically: 
 - its a non-stop grind fest. Everything costs stars, even the ammo for the Shields, Bombs and the lasers. I basically don't use them because of this as sometimes on the map they drop ammo for them randomly and thats enough for me.


All-in-all the game is fun, but the grind feels abit too much at some point. Also the gandgets have no use if you need to spend stars on the ammo at every turn. I will be too focused upgrading all of my weapons before considering buying them, maybe at the end when I have upgraded everything but at that point i will get bored and move on to the next game.

38873782.review:
I managed to do 100% achivements on this one so I guess I will bring my thoughts out.

Rating for shmups fans: 8 / 10 
Rating for other players: 6 / 10

The game mechanic itself is pretty decent. You play, gain the in-game currency and invest in development of your plane. Levels become easier and easier as you progress with your small plane and unlock the addons. Average developed plane will do just fine to beat the game on normal difficulty and a casual gamer will stop playing the title then. 8 levels + 9th bonus one. 4 to 6 hour will do fine for casual gamer. That's why I expect regular people to judge it 6/10. Graphic is colorful, well looking and fps level is above avarage making the game smooth like butter and catchy. My GF said: "oh what's that, looks fine?"

But those who really looks for the shmup challange will progress with unlocking all levels on higher difficulties where the fun begins. Enemies are more powerfull, faster and the screen begins to be tight as Sasha Grey. Game begins to punish every single mistake. Beating level on insane difficulty will force you to memorize the level and to get some strategy before you start how to alocate your extra resources. It took me about 22 hours to beat the game and unlock all the achivements.

If you will try to get all the achivements join the discussion group where people are adding each other to rescue each other (after crush - no need to play at the same time).

There are only 2 cons of the game:
1)  "House of Cards" achivement. My suggestion for everyone trying to get it is to make a break in playing this title. It looks like the card drop algorithm is time based forcing you to return after one or two days to get the new drop. I played like 40 level in a row to get the last card. I made two days break and it occured just at the first try.

2) Only 9 levels. Obviously minus :)

If my review helped you please feel free to rate it and add me on steam. Maybe I will help.
High five.

38790653.review: I enjoyed this more than any other shoot em up ever and I've been gaming since R-Type came out in the 1980's.

38788134.review:
I bought the game after reading good reviews about it and its sequel on GamingOnLinux, because I loved Raiden and to support a day 1 Linux game!

I finished it with my girlfriend 2 days ago.

She dislikes playing video games in general, especially ones that seem to take forever (to her), but enjoyed playing this one. She was on auto-fire, using the keyboard, so not having to worry about much and we were able to play together. The levels were not super long so she never felt stuck in something.

Playing as a ghost on level 5 was a good way for her to train (I have the card) ;) Let it be known that she joined after I had got to the 8th stage and got the plane mostly upgraded, so not starting on the beginning with the super weak base plane...

I showed her SFR and she looked forward to playing it if I were to buy it which I may.


As for me, I usually dislike grinding, but I enjoyed this game quite a bit. I finished it but will keep going after all achievements which I usually don't do, because it's feasible and fun enough. Having said that I do dislike the fact that the game is blocked until you have enough medals, ie enough achievements... It'll prevent bad players or people that just don't want to grind medals to move forward. I also dislike the fact that we have less missions than on Android, even though the 9th says that more should be coming after us.

The story is never explained, it would have been nicer to get a little more, or nothing at all, I don't get the point of what we get. The game also needs a way to remove upgrades, it's too boring to get all medals in the first stage after the plane is maxed out, but I also don't want to keep doing the same stage over and over before doing anything else.

The game is not for colorblind people, as sometimes it's a bit difficult to know what is coming at you, especially under clouds ;)

The game is also not very long, only 9 stages, each one being fairly short. Without grinding/going for medals, it would not take very long, and that's kind of a cheap way to build a game.

Overall, for a low price, I had a lot of fun, and was happy to share it with a non gamer. I will look at getting the sequel!

38787253.review: Поначалу сидишь такой,уши в карманы,ноги за ухи,левая рука играючи расправляеться с козявками в носу, но после прохождения пару-тройку миссий начинаешь понимать,что раскорячившись в кресле и понадеявшись на изи прохождение-ты допустил большую ошибку.С каждым новым уровнем уже игра играючи берет тебя за яйца и медленно сжимая их в своей лохматой ладони спрашивает: "А не желаешь ли ты,мой драгоценный друх,прочитать в субтитрах небольшую сюжетную линию?" в то время на экране творится йобого страшнейшее.

39482890.review: Хорошая игрушка, играл в нее еще на нокии N82 в хз каком году (наверное это был 2010й). Потом увидел знакомое название в PS Store - instant buy. Отлично играется как на вите, так и на PS4; crossbuy\crosssave прилагаются. Трек в 5м уровне крут (он называется end titles\end credits), кстати в продолжении reloaded OST самая слабая часть игры - на нем видимо сэкономили (ни одной запоминающейся мелодии). Немного утомляет прокачка (опять таки никаких проблем - достаточно быстро, в сравнении с reloaded). Почему я пишу про плойку в отзыве стима? Очень просто - увидев её в стиме точно знал, что это. И - сознаюсь честно - купил только ради OST (того самого трека). Но, как оказалось - версия стима во всем лучше, чем консольная - есть нативные русские сабы, возможность выбора цветовой температуры, возможность включить автострельбу (то же касается опять таки и reloaded). Подключите геймпад и наслаждайтесь (возможность играть вдвоем с одного ПК в наличии) :)
